title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in million euros, with a total of 10 data points.
Overall Sales in million euros has increased over the Year
Sales in million euros is gradually constant from 2009 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Sales in million euros about 26937.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Sales in million euros about 17473.0 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in million euros with a total of 10 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2018 to 2009.
